name: nodcam
description: Access and stream web camera in nodejs using ffmpeg, websockets and HTML5.

scripts.ffmpeg: ffmpeg -y -f vfwcap -video_size 640x480 -framerate 40 -rtbufsize 100M -i video='Logitech':audio='Logitech' video/latest.mp4 -movflags faststart -framerate 40 -vcodec mpeg1video -preset veryfast -maxrate 3000k -bufsize 4000k -c:a aac -b:a 160k -ar 44100 -b:a 128k -f mpeg1video http://localhost:8082/12345/640/480
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run streaming-server" "npm run ffmpeg" "npm run express-server" "npm run chat-server"
